alert.note: Alert for Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 8:56AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF POTTER AND TIOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to one quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 854 AM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from Coudersport to Cherry Springs State Park moving east at 25 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Coudersport, Roulette, Galeton, Leetonia, Keating Summit, Denton Hill State Park, Cherry Springs State Park, Lyman Run State Park, Leonard Harrison State Park, Austin, Sweden Valley, and Ski Denton Ski Area. This includes Route 6 from near Roulette to near Galeton. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
